20101221010653.000|20101221010656.000|CC1|HIS CAR WAS HIT BY A ROCK TODAY.
20101221010656.000|20101221010703.000|CC1|>> RIGHT HERE.                  
20101221010703.000|20101221010704.000|CC1|RIGHT HERE.                     
20101221010704.000|20101221010706.000|CC1|>> HOW BIG WAS THE ROCK?        
20101221010706.000|20101221010708.000|CC1|>> THE SIZE OF A BASKETBALL.    
20101221010708.000|20101221010709.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT COULD HAVE      
20101221010709.000|20101221010711.000|CC1|BEEN A LOT WORSE, CONSIDERING   
20101221010711.000|20101221010713.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED ON THIS TRIP TO   
20101221010713.000|20101221010715.000|CC1|PCH OF THE WEEKEND.

20101221011731.000|20101221011734.000|CC1|MAY HAVE CAUSED THIS EXPLOSION.

20101221011735.000|20101221011737.000|CC1|LOTS OF IT.

20101221012612.000|20101221012613.000|CC1|PAUL: PASSENGERS ON THE BURNING 
20101221012613.000|20101221012615.000|CC1|BUS WERE FORCED TO JUMP FOR     
20101221012615.000|20101221012616.000|CC1|THEIR LIVES.                    
20101221012616.000|20101221012618.000|CC1|IT BURST INTO FLAMES A FEW MILES
20101221012618.000|20101221012620.000|CC1|FROM ITS DESTINATION.           
20101221012620.000|20101221012621.000|CC1|THE FIRE FORCED SOME PASSENGERS 
20101221012621.000|20101221012623.000|CC1|TO LEAP FROM WINDOWS BECAUSE THE
20101221012623.000|20101221012625.000|CC1|FRONT DOOR WOULD NOT OPEN.      
20101221012625.000|20101221012627.000|CC1|REMARKABLY NO ONE WAS INJURED.  
20101221012627.000|20101221012629.000|CC1|IT LOOKED LIKE A MECHANICAL FIRE
20101221012629.000|20101221012631.000|CC1|CAUSED THAT.                    
20101221012631.000|20101221012634.000|CC1|THE WHITE HOUSE SAYS PRESIDENT  
20101221012634.000|20101221012638.000|CC1|BARACK OBAMA SIGNS TO -- PLANS  
20101221012638.000|20101221012639.000|CC1|TO SIGN THE REPEAL ON           
20101221012639.000|20101221012641.000|CC1|AND "DON'T ASK, DON'T TELL" ON  
20101221012641.000|20101221012641.000|CC1|WEDNESDAY.
